trans-unit.source: Represents keys that are generated using symmetric algorithms and are only stored in the local computer's random access memory.
trans-unit.target: Representa as chaves que são geradas com algoritmos simétricos e apenas são armazenadas na memória de acesso aleatório do computador local.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this class is only used by the infrastructure to transform XML using a symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, esta classe é apenas utilizada pela infraestrutura para a transformação XML a utilizar uma chave simétrica.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.InMemorySymmetricSecurityKey"></xref> class using the specified symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.InMemorySymmetricSecurityKey"> </xref> classe utilizando a chave simétrica especificada.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém a chave simétrica.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: symmetricKey is .
trans-unit.target: symmetricKeyis .

trans-unit.source: symmetricKey is zero length.
trans-unit.target: symmetricKeyé o comprimento zero.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.InMemorySymmetricSecurityKey"></xref> class using the specified symmetric key and a value that indicates whether the binary data must be cloned.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.InMemorySymmetricSecurityKey"> </xref> classe utilizando a chave simétrica especificada e valor que indica se os dados binários devem ser clonados.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém a chave simétrica.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to clone the array passed into the `symmetricKey` parameter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para clonar a matriz transmitida para o `symmetricKey` parâmetro; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: symmetricKey is .
trans-unit.target: symmetricKeyis .

trans-unit.source: symmetricKey is zero length.
trans-unit.target: symmetricKeyé o comprimento zero.

trans-unit.source: Decrypts the specified encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: Desencriptar a chave encriptada especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use the static fields of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Utilize os campos estáticos do <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>classe para especificar o algoritmo.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm that was used to encrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo criptográfico que foi utilizado para encriptar a chave.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém a chave encriptada.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the decrypted key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém a chave desencriptada.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: algorithmNão é suportada.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Encripta a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use the static fields of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Utilize os campos estáticos do <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>classe para especificar o algoritmo.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm to encrypt the key with.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo criptográfico para encriptar a chave com.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém a chave.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém a chave encriptada.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: algorithmNão é suportada.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap"></xref>, or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap"></xref>, or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Generates a derived key using the specified cryptographic algorithm and parameters for the current key.
trans-unit.target: Gera uma chave derivada utilizando os parâmetros e o algoritmo de encriptação especificado para a chave atual.

trans-unit.source: To specify P-SHA1 as the cryptographic algorithm, use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation> field.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar P SHA1 como o algoritmo criptográfico, utilize o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation>campo.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation>

trans-unit.source: A URI that represents the cryptographic algorithm to use to generate the derived key.
trans-unit.target: URI que representa o algoritmo criptográfico a utilizar para gerar a chave derivada.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the label parameter for the cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém o parâmetro de etiqueta para o algoritmo criptográfico.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the nonce that is used to create a derived key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém o nonce é utilizado para criar uma chave derivada.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The size of the derived key.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da chave derivada.

trans-unit.source: The position at which the derived key is located in the byte array that is returned from this method.
trans-unit.target: A posição em que a chave derivada está localizada na matriz de bytes que é devolvida este método.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the derived key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém a chave derivada.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: algorithmNão é suportada.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os algoritmos suportados é <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a transform that decrypts cipher text using the specified cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma transformação que desencripta cifras texto utilizando o algoritmo de encriptação especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the fields that represent decryption algorithms in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Utilize os campos que representam os algoritmos de desencriptação no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>classe para especificar o algoritmo.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic algorithm that decrypts cipher text, such as encrypted XML.
trans-unit.target: Um algoritmo criptográfico que desencripta cifras texto, tal como encriptados XML.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the initialization vector (<xref uid="langword_csharp_IV" name="IV" href=""></xref>) for the specified algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém o vetor de inicialização (<xref uid="langword_csharp_IV" name="IV" href=""></xref>) para o algoritmo especificado.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform"></xref> that represents the decryption transform.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform"> </xref> que representa a transformação de desencriptação.

trans-unit.source: algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: algorithmNão é suportada.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a transform that encrypts XML using the specified cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma transformação que encripta XML utilizando o algoritmo de encriptação especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the fields that represent encryption algorithms in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Utilize os campos que representam os algoritmos de encriptação no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>classe para especificar o algoritmo.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic algorithm that encrypts XML.
trans-unit.target: Algoritmos criptográficos que encripta XML.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the initialization vector (<xref uid="langword_csharp_IV" name="IV" href=""></xref>) for the specified algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém o vetor de inicialização (<xref uid="langword_csharp_IV" name="IV" href=""></xref>) para o algoritmo especificado.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform"></xref> that represents the encryption transform.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform"> </xref> que representa a transformação de encriptação.

trans-unit.source: algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: algorithmNão é suportada.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size, in bits, of the initialization vector (<xref uid="langword_csharp_IV" name="IV" href=""></xref>) that is required for the specified cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho, em bits e do vetor de inicialização (<xref uid="langword_csharp_IV" name="IV" href=""></xref>) que é necessário para o algoritmo de encriptação especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the fields that represent encryption algorithms in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Utilize os campos que representam os algoritmos de encriptação no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>classe para especificar o algoritmo.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm to get the size of the initialization vector (<xref uid="langword_csharp_IV" name="IV" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo criptográfico para obter o tamanho do vetor de inicialização (<xref uid="langword_csharp_IV" name="IV" href=""></xref>).

trans-unit.source: The size, in bits, of the initialization vector () that is required for the cryptographic algorithm specified in the algorithm parameter.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho, em bits e do vetor de inicialização () que é necessário para o algoritmo criptográfico especificado no algorithm parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: algorithmNão é suportada.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the specified keyed hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância do algoritmo hash codificada especificado.

trans-unit.source: The keyed hash algorithm to get an instance of.
trans-unit.target: O o algoritmo de hash para obter uma instância de.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm"></xref> that represents the keyed hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm"> </xref> que representa o o algoritmo de hash.

trans-unit.source: algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: algorithmNão é suportada.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.HmacSha1Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os algoritmos suportados é <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.HmacSha1Signature"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the specified symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância do algoritmo simétrico especificado.

trans-unit.source: The symmetric algorithm to get an instance of.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo simétrico para obter uma instância de.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> that represents the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm"> </xref> que representa o algoritmo simétrico.

trans-unit.source: algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: algorithmNão é suportada.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap"></xref>
trans-unit.target: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap"></xref>, and<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap"></xref>

trans-unit.source: Gets the bytes that represent the symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os bytes que representam a chave simétrica.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém a chave simétrica.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses asymmetric keys.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o algoritmo especificado utiliza chaves assimétricas.

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo criptográfico.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified algorithm uses asymmetric keys; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Quando o algoritmo especificado utiliza chaves assimétricas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm is supported by this class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o algoritmo especificado é suportado por esta classe.

trans-unit.source: The symmetric algorithms that are supported by this class are the algorithms represented by the following fields: - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.HmacSha1Signature> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap>
trans-unit.target: Os algoritmos simétricos que são suportados por esta classe são os algoritmos representados pelos seguintes campos:- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.HmacSha1Signature>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap></xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.HmacSha1Signature>

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo criptográfico.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified algorithm is supported by this class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Quando o algoritmo especificado é suportado por esta classe; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses symmetric keys.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o algoritmo especificado utiliza chaves simétricas.

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo criptográfico.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified algorithm uses symmetric keys; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Quando o algoritmo especificado utiliza chaves simétricas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size, in bits, of the key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho, em bits e da chave.

trans-unit.source: The size, in bits, of the key.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho, em bits e da chave.
